newsitem.title: IRAN: Iran arrests two Tanzanians for smuggling heroin.
newsitem.headline: Iran arrests two Tanzanians for smuggling heroin.

text.p: Police in central Iran have arrested two Tanzanians for trying to smuggle 1.5 kg (3.3 lb) of heroin by swallowing it, Iran's IRNA news agency said on Wednesday.

It quoted the head of an Islamic revolutionary court in Kashan as saying it would rule soon in the case of the two unnamed Tanzanians who between them allegedly swallowed 152 small bags containing heroin. They were arrested two weeks ago, it added.
Possession of 30 grams (just over an ounce) of heroin is punishable by death under Iranian law.
